explains: n. 社会化，社会主义化

sentences.en: Female socialization emphasizes getting along with others.
sentences.cn: 女性社会化进程强调与他人和睦相处。

sentences.en: As we saw in the preceding chapter, groups can be powerful agents of socialization.
sentences.cn: 如我们在前一章所见，团组可以是社会化的有力动因。

sentences.en: First, primary groups are critical to the socialization process.
sentences.cn: 第一，初级群体对社会化进程至关重要。
